alert.note: Alert for Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 2:56PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Russell County through 330 PM CDT... At 256 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gorham, or near Walker, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russell, Gorham, Milberger and Russell Airport. This includes Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 175 and 190. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
